Package qlang.core.lang.Q

Class QClass

java.lang.Object
qlang.core.lang.Q.QClass
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class QClass extends Object implements Cloneable
This class represents the QClass, controlling classes and objects.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    QClass.QObject
    This class represents an instance of a QObject, used for objects created from QClasses.
